PURCHASES.PAYMENT_METHOD_EXPLANATION: This field provides the agreed payment conditions of the purchase order.  A purchase can either be paid up front, at delivery, or in some other combination of payments.

ERRORS.INVALID_ITEMS: Some of the purchase order items have errors.  Please correct these mistakes and resubmit the purchase order.
ERRORS.INVALID_ACCOUNTS: Some of the items selected for purchase are missing critical accounts.  Please confirm that all inventory items have a COGS account and a stock account.

STATUS.CANCELLED_DESC: The purchase order has been cancelled
STATUS.CONFIRMED_DESC: The purchase order has been confirmed by the supplier that it can be delivered
STATUS.EXCESSIVE_RECEIVED_QUANTITY: The purchase order has been received but with excessive quantity
STATUS.NOT_RECEIVED_DESC: The purchase order products are not yet in stock
STATUS.RECEIVED_DESC: The purchase order has been completed and products are in stock
STATUS.WAITING_CONFIRMATION_DESC: The supplier has not confirmed that the purchase order can be delivered
